thread.title: Katrina
thread.title_full: Home Zone Furniture reviewed by Katrina

author: Katrina
title: Katrina
text: Service was great, salesman was nice and very helpful. The only thing that was frustrating is all of the sectionals I liked were on back order and would not be in for 3 weeks! That's a long time to go with an empty house with no where to sit! But, I still ordered it because it was a great price and the quality was good. I also purchased a mattress from here back in July and it has been great. I will purchase from this company again for sure!
